short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Casual Color Matching Puzzle Game

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Color Matcher is an engaging puzzle game that challenges players to match colors and solve vibrant puzzles. Test your color-matching skills, enjoy visually stunning levels, and sharpen your brain in this relaxing yet addictive game. Perfect for puzzle enthusiasts of all ages
